abstract: Canadian authorities rearrest Ian Bush after his court appearance for tying up 101-year-old veteran Ernest Cote and leaving him for dead, charging Bush with 2007 murders of three other elderly people.
lead_paragraph: Ian Bush, a human resources manager from suburban Ottawa who was arrested in December in an attack on a 101-year-old veteran, is now accused of murdering three people in 2007

headline.main: Canada Attack Suspect Is Now Charged in 3 Killings
headline.print_headline: Canada Attack Suspect Is Now Charged in 3 Killings
